scripts.write-translations-all: npm run write-translations -- --locale fr && npm run write-translations -- --locale ja && npm run write-translations -- --locale ru && npm run write-translations -- --locale zh-CN && npm run write-translations -- --locale zh-TW && npm run write-translations -- --locale de && npm run write-translations -- --locale es && npm run write-translations -- --locale pt && npm run write-translations -- --locale ar && npm run write-translations -- --locale ko && npm run write-translations -- --locale pl && npm run write-translations -- --locale it
